abstracts.cdata!:
The project is intended to finance the
            development of approximately 135 livestock beef ranches and
            dairy farms and to provide technical assistance. Loans to
            ranchers would be used for on-ranch improvements such as
            pasture establishment, fencing, watering facilities, ranch
            buildings, parasite control equipment and improved breeding
            stock. In this way, the project would remedy some of the
            present inadequacies in animal husbandry, nutrition and
            animal health, and would increase total cattle numbers and
            herd productivity.
